reviews.review:
One of the first FPS games that pioneered the genre and was a massive deal back in 1998 putting Valve on the map as the developer we know them today.

Still great to play through now even 20+ years later

games great if you can get past chapter 2 also play the first portal game after this game and then portal 2 then both the half life 2 episodes that's how i find it best in the chronological order have fun

fuck this fucking piece of shit.

There's no direction in this game, the combat is boring, so many mechanics are broken and don't work, looks like an n64 game which has not aged well, it can become SO DAMN HARD FOR NO REASON, ammo is limited, health is more limited, JUST SKIP THIS ONE AND PLAY HALF-LIFE 2

thug-life, √© um jogo que conta a hist√≥ria do morgan freemen e como ele fez deus no todo poderoso, um bom papel, mas diferente do filme aqui a terra √© invadida por aliens muito fodas, ai vc tem que batalha.
O jogo √© revolucion√°rio, ningu√©m pode tirar esse titulo dele, sendo um fps lan√ßado em 1998 pra pc, uma plataforma totalmente nixada na √©poca, sendo que a maioria das coisas s√≥ saia pra console, tendo no pc doom um grande jogo half-life vem e destroi tudo bom suas novas mec√¢nicas, nova gameplay, grapicos que nem um pc da nasa podia rodar, e uma hist√≥rinha legal, o jogo tras tudo isso numa √©poca onde n√£o tinha nada pra pc, mas n√£o s√≥ afetando o pessoal no pc, como tamb√©m os dos consoles, fazendo at√© hoje pessoas se inspirarem nesse jogo, e n√£o de poco, mas o jogo peca por se velho, na √©poca n√£o tinha referencia, ent√£o tudo que eles fizeram foi totalmente novo, e assim vem coisas que hoje em dia s√£o chatas, igual morrer dunada, ou inimigos chatos de matar, ou pequenos demais, baruhlos chatos, e fases quase imposs√≠veis, mas ao longo to tempo isso foi mudando, e assim mudando totalmente a forma de um jogo com esse, fazendo tudo ficar melhor, e assim half-life pecar nas suas inova√ß√µes, n√£o dizendo que o jogo √© ruim, mas as vezes pode ficar chato, mas vale muito a pena jogar, comprar por 4 conto √© conserta o melhor que vc pode fazer, tendo personagens legais, como o freemen e o cara misterioso do final, mas bom jogo,uma boa revolu√ß√£o do mundos dos games, sendo que por ele nos tivemos um mod, que se transformou no cs, e tamb√©m no team fortres, que hoje s√£o um dos maiores jogos de todos, bom demais, gostei da jogatina, mas pode ficar chato as vezes, 8/10 :) bom jogo valve.

amazing game super nostalgic. if u enjoy the graphics of old valve games then this is the game for u. kinda glitchy sometimes so make sure u have extra save files!! however i love this game so much, the ambience of it all is beautiful. enjoy!
warning sustos con headcrabs  fuera de eso esta bueno el juego
Half life is good, but If you venture too far into the options settings, terrible game breaking unplayable glitches can happen, be warned
Literal legend among games, you would be stupid to pass up playing it.
Better than Half Life 2 I think.
i died. and i died again
Disable HD models and you have one of the best single player games on steam.
Its unforgiving game but really fun when you get the hang of it a true classic
the game doesn't let you change difficulty mid play through. i selected hard and ended up cheating near the end. good thing this game doesn't have achievements

Nothing attracts me to a game faster than great reviews about a game's story and writing but this game makes me so motion-sick!  I cannot recommend keeping a bucket beside your computer and playing through the nausea to get to the story.  A shame.  I will try Black Mesa which I understand is an upgraded version of the same story.

People often call Half Life a "timeless classic" and they are right, Half Life holds up incredibly well to the point that I actually like it more the Half Life 2 (which I played first). The problem with Half Life 2 being that while it is a brilliant game it focuses more on story so the gameplay ended up being simplified too much?

But I am so glad that I went back and gave Half Life a chance as it has easily become one of my favourite FPS games ever made and I didn`t regret my time here.

If you love story-driven FPS Games this is a must play as this game single handed changed the FPS genre forever with is narrative, story-telling & gameplay.
Si nunca has jugado este juego no le sabes

This game is one of the most IMPORTANT video games of all time! For it's legacy alone! It's graphics haven't aged to great, but for the time, it was a BIG deal! It's game play still holds up really well! So yes, the game surely does live up to the hype!

I quite enjoyed the first Half-Life however there are a few quirks if you're used to playing games like Call Of Duty or Doom you shouldn't go into a room guns blazing you should observe your surroundings see what might be the best way to take out an enemy or to just avoid it to save ammo (i should also say i have not played half-life 2 yet)

Been a console player all my life so I decided to learn mouse and keyboard FPS games with a classic. Enjoyed the variation of levels, enemy types and weapons. You can really see why it was revolutionary back in the day. Would recommend, the giant monster baby at the end was annoying so minus points for that, I guess.
